Traits.Name: Sturdy
Traits.Description: Immune to shove, daze, and stun.

Traits.Name: Fortify
Traits.Description: At the end of their turn, gains vigilance 1.

Actions.Name: Battalion of Limbs
Actions.Effect: After the royal guard damages a foe with this attack, they mark that foe. This mark can be placed on any number of characters and stacks indefinitely. For each stack of the mark, this attack deals +[D] on hit or miss. A character can save against this mark at the end of their turn to clear all stacks, but only if they are not adjacent to the royal guard.

Actions.Name: Weapon Vortex
Actions.Description: Foes in range 2 of the royal guard are shoved 1 towards it.

Actions.Name: Wind of Obliteration
Actions.Effect: The Royal Guard dashes 2 with phasing, then deals [D] to all adjacent characters and shoves them 1. Then, repeat this effect twice.
